text: Ari Ólafsson () (born 21 May 1998) is an Icelandic singer who represented his country in the Eurovision Song Contest 2018 with the song "Our Choice" which ended 19th (last) in Semi Final 1 with 15 points. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century Icelandic singers Ari Olafsson Ari Olafsson Ari Olafsson Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants of 2018 Category:21st-century male singers
title: Ari Ólafsson
